name: Georgify Dark (Hacker News)
description: Based on Georgify, has unicode arrows. Only tested on Mozilla Firefox.
additional_info:
Changelog: 
2013-10-26: Remove vote arrows yet again.
2013-06-13: Fix downvote arrows.
2013-03-15 (#3): Set page width without causing comment position weirdness
2013-03-15 (#2): Fix weird comment positions at the expense of setting page width
2013-03-15: Hide arrow icons again...
2012-09-11: Fix for non-https: arrow icons weren't hiding properly
